title: Attack on Titan
description: Humanity is pushed to the brink of extinction by man-eating titans and fights back with desperate battles inside and outside massive walls.

title: Naruto
description: A loud but kind ninja dreams of becoming Hokage while carrying the burden of a dangerous secret inside him.

title: Death Note
description: A genius high school student gains a notebook that can kill anyone whose name is written in it and begins a battle of wits with a mysterious detective.

title: Erased
description: A struggling manga artist travels back in time to prevent a childhood tragedy and stop a serial kidnapper.

title: One Piece
description: A rubber-powered pirate sets sail with his crew to find the legendary treasure One Piece and become the Pirate King.

title: Bleach
description: A teenager who can see ghosts becomes a Soul Reaper and fights evil spirits to protect both the human world and the Soul Society.

title: Demon Slayer
description: After his family is slaughtered by demons a kind boy joins the Demon Slayer Corps to find a cure for his demon-turned sister.

title: Jujutsu Kaisen
description: A high schooler who eats a cursed finger becomes host to a powerful curse and joins a jujutsu sorcerer school.

title: Black Clover
description: A magicless boy in a world of magic tries to become the Wizard King through sheer determination and anti-magic power.

title: Boruto
description: The next generation of ninja including Naruto's son Boruto face new threats while dealing with modern technology and legacy.

title: Bucchigiri?!
description: A boy gets dragged into wild brawls and supernatural battles among delinquents after meeting an old friend.

title: 5 Centimeters per Second
description: Childhood friends drift apart as they grow up and struggle with distance time and unspoken feelings.

title: Darling in the FranXX
description: Children pilot giant robots called FranXX to protect the last human settlements while uncovering dark secrets about their world.

title: Grand Blue
description: A freshman moves to a seaside town for university and gets pulled into a wild diving club full of chaos and drinking.

title: Haikyuu!!
description: A short but passionate boy joins his high school volleyball team aiming to reach the national tournament.

title: Idaten Jump
description: A boy transported to another world must race on MTB tracks called X-Zones to return home.

title: Josee to Tora to Sakana-tachi
description: An introverted college student becomes caretaker for a sharp-tongued wheelchair-bound girl and they slowly change each other's lives.

title: Love is War
description: Two genius student council leaders are in love but treat romance as a war where the first to confess loses.

title: Kimi no Na wa.
description: A boy and a girl from different places begin swapping bodies and form a connection across space and time.

title: Koe no Katachi
description: A former bully seeks redemption by reconnecting with the deaf girl he once tormented.

title: Konosuba
description: A shut-in gamer dies embarrassingly and is reborn in a fantasy world with a useless goddess and a chaotic party.

title: Kuroko's Basketball
description: An invisible-style player and his new team challenge the legendary Generation of Miracles in high school basketball.

title: Mushoku Tensei: Jobless Reincarnation
description: A hopeless NEET is reincarnated into a magical world and decides to live this second life with no regrets.

title: Re:Zero
description: A boy transported to another world discovers he can return from death and repeatedly relives painful timelines to save his friends.

title: Nisekoi
description: A yakuza heir and a rival gang leader's daughter must pretend to date despite secretly liking other people.

title: The Tunnel to Summer the Exit of Goodbyes
description: Two teenagers find a mysterious tunnel that can grant wishes at the cost of time and confront painful memories and choices.

title: Noragami
description: A minor god dreams of having millions of worshippers while taking odd jobs and battling corrupted spirits.

title: Orange
description: A girl receives letters from her future self asking her to prevent the regrets surrounding a new transfer student.

title: Prison School
description: Five boys at a strict all-girls school are thrown into the underground student council's prison after being caught peeping.

title: Sakamoto Days
description: A legendary former hitman now living as a chubby shopkeeper is forced back into action when his past catches up.

title: Your Lie in April
description: A piano prodigy who stopped playing after trauma meets a free-spirited violinist who brings color back to his world.

title: Spy x Family
description: A spy must create a fake family for a mission not knowing his wife is an assassin and his adopted daughter is a telepath.

title: Tokyo Ghoul
description: A college student becomes half-ghoul after an accident and struggles between human and ghoul worlds.

title: Tokyo Revengers
description: A man travels back to his middle school days to change the future and save his ex-girlfriend from a violent gang.
